wordpressPost.title: The Perfect Church
wordpressPost.content:
I guess one thing I seem to be constantly thinking about these days is church, I don’t mean just a building or a service, nor do I just mean where ‘2 or more are gathered’ but I guess I mean both.

I seem to keep finding flaws in church, I keep finding my expections of churches not met and I guess to an extent that is making me lose faith in church…or not…I think what I mean is after my many circles of thoughts I have come to the conclusion that outside of heaven there is no perfect church, however every church has different good bits.

So where does this lead? I think it leads to me thinking that over summer the more churches I can get to the better, I’m still gonna park every sunday I possibly can but evenings are potentially my oyster!
